subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. tournaments begin next weekend, and the Virginia teams, with a men’s player charged with first-degree murder in the death of a women’s player, will surely be the defining stories.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. tournaments begin next weekend, and the Virginia teams, with a men’s player charged with first-degree murder in the death of a women’s player, will surely be the defining stories.
